summary: This document is an email chain from September 2021 regarding a discovery request for the Jeffrey Epstein/Ghislaine Maxwell trial. It involves FBI Victim Services Division personnel coordinating to provide communications (emails, texts) with a victim/witness. The chain reveals procedural efforts to gather contact information and communications for discovery purposes ahead of the November 2021 trial.

persons.name: Sunny
persons.context: Appears as an email correspondent following up on missing emails related to the Epstein/Maxwell discovery request.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a subject of the New York investigation and upcoming trial referenced in the discovery request.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a co-subject of the New York investigation and upcoming trial referenced in the discovery request.

connections.description: Both are FBI personnel involved in handling discovery materials related to victim communications in the Epstein/Maxwell case.
Both are named as subjects of the same New York investigation and scheduled trial, indicating their alleged association in criminal activity.

events.title: Epstein/Maxwell Trial Date
events.description: The scheduled trial date for the New York investigation of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, as referenced in the discovery request.

events.title: Discovery Request Deadline
events.description: The deadline (COB) for providing discovery information, including communications with victims/witnesses/attorneys, to the USAO for the Epstein/Maxwell trial.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively gathering communications (emails, texts, voicemails) with victims/witnesses/attorneys for discovery in the Epstein/Maxwell trial as of September 2021.
A victim specialist reported having various forms of contact (face-to-face, telephonic, email, text) with a victim, but text messages were lost due to a device update, though possibly retrievable.
The trial for the New York investigation of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell was scheduled for November 29, 2021.
The discovery request had a short timeframe, with a deadline of COB Monday, September 13, 2021, indicating urgency in preparation for trial.
The document references case number 50D-NY-3027571 for the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.
